TopicTitle: What is this? The popping out messages about recovery of part

Articles.Content:
It showing that i need part have 1200 parts in 500 stages (Sic!)

But i never build behemoth like that, and all my kerbonauts are in astronauts center and boring because i not send them on any mission for a while

this parts to recover pop-up very often some time cover the screen, it very annoying

I use following MODS

Gemini from

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/230467-corvus-a-small-two-kerbal-pod

MechJeb 2

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/220221-mechjeb

Kerbal Alarm Clock

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24786-1-0-x-Kerbal-Alarm-Clock-v3-4-0-0-(June-27)

and Kerbal Engineer Redux

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/18230-1-0-4-Kerbal-Engineer-Redux-v1-0-17-0
